item.title: 'Back to our roots': Female GOP lawmakers work to win back feminism from the left
item.description: Republican women are working to flip the decadeslong narrative that Democrats are the party of women.

item.title: Mike Lee continues calling for abolition of TSA
item.description: Sen. Mike Lee is continuing to advocate for the abolition of the Transportation Security Administration.
